thread.title: Dhanush’s thriller flick set to move to Visakhapatnam
thread.title_full: Dhanush’s thriller flick set to move to Visakhapatnam

author: Deccan
title: Dhanush’s thriller flick set to move to Visakhapatnam
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 05, 2015, 06.26 am Dhanush The shooting of Dhanush’s untitled film with Prabhu Solomon has been going on in full swing for some time. It was reported earlier that the film will have a fair number of sequences happening inside a train and that stuntmen from Hollywood were imported to helm few key action scenes. Billed as the costliest film of Prabhu Solomon, the film has Keerthy Suresh playing the female lead. The latest we hear about the movie is that the crew is all set to head to Visakhapatnam to shoot for crucial scenes. The team is likely to wrap up the shoot by December, after which the VIP star will join other films in his pipeline. Reportedly, Harish Uthaman is pitted against Dhanush in the movie. entertainment Kollywood Dhanush Prabhu Solomon Also Read Movie review 'Mundasupatti': A tragedy today is bound to be a comedy tomorrow Priyanka Chopra's bruised face in 'Mary Kom' Abhi-Aish, Gauri, Riteish party at Karan Johar's place Actor-director Raghuveer passed away
